001package Tools_;
002
003import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
004import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
005import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
006import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
007
008/**
009 * Allows the user to select and open one of the internal sample images.
010 * The image is loaded from the associated JAR file.
011 * 
012 * @author WB
013 * @see GeneralSampleImage
014 */
015public class Open_Sample_Image implements PlugIn {
016
017        @Override
018        public void run(String arg) {
019                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
020                GeneralSampleImage init = GeneralSampleImage.values()[0];
021                gd.addEnumChoice("Select", init);
022                
023                gd.showDialog();
024                if(gd.wasCanceled()) 
025                        return;
026                
027                ImageResource ir = gd.getNextEnumChoice(GeneralSampleImage.class);
028                ir.getImage().show();
029        }
030
031}
